amendment.description: To provide that the people of the United States observe "National Airborne Day" with appropriate programs, ceremonies and activities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1628 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1628 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hagel. (consideration: CR S9200; text: CR S9200) To provide that the people of the United States observe "National Airborne Day" with appropriate programs, ceremonies and activities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1628 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hagel.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1628 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
